doc:
Bertie Wright https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bertie_Wright 0 Albert James Matthew Wright (6 February 1871 – 7 March 1960), known as Bertie Wright, was a British actor of the silent era. Wright was born in Blackburn, Lancashire, England, and died on 7 March 1960, in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. Albert_James_Matthew_Wright ( 6_February_1871 – 7_March_1960 ) , known as Bertie_Wright , was a_British_actor of the_silent_era . Wright was_born in Blackburn , Lancashire , England , and died on 7_March_1960 , in Sydney , New_South_Wales , Australia .
